course_title: Senior Seminar: The Crushing Real.of Space Bus
class_notes:
(Complete Topic - The Crushing Reality of Space Business)
Tuesdays, 6:00-8:00 pm - Class Dates: 1/30, 2/6, 2/13, 2/20, 2/27, alternate date: 3/5


Seminar Description: If you think running a startup is crazy, try a hardware startup... or go full crazy to an energetic hardware startup. Sprinkle in billionaire competitors, brilliant young talent, a huge future market, and a general lack of rationale business sense, and you have a decade worth of insights from running a space startup. 
     But this seminar isn't just crazy stories. It turns out there is real value in space, and that running a company has many of the same challenges regardless of industry.
course_description: Senior seminar courses fall outside the scope of traditional academic coursework, and instead allow students to learn from and interact with experienced practitioners, and to develop industry-specific insights, fine-tune career skills, and increase professional exposure.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 6148, Section #: 1108, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 6-8p, Instructor: A. Hershatter, Status: Closed
